lenders.name: Maria

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to help somehow...

lenders.name: Mueller Family

lenders.occupational_info: Learning about the world every day in a hands on manner.

lenders.name: Phil & Ann Marie
lenders.loan_because: Repaying a loan helps build dignity and pride and helps improve the lives of yourself and your loved ones gives you hope and confidence that things can get better. That said, I make loans because it makes me feel good to be helping others.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I want to help even if it is very little.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be the best use of my money to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from business, I was in industrial equipment sales (conveyors) and then studied and was ordained into ministry.  I served as chaplain at a retirement community for 8 yrs 9 mos.

lenders.occupational_info: I help employees so they are treated equally.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it's a smart investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Buyer for a company that designs and subcontracts the building of winglets that go on the tips of the wings of Boeing airplanes.  Winglets improve the fuel efficiency of certain Boeing passenger planes by creating more lift.  I buy parts that make up these winglets.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a recording/audio engineer.

lenders.name: Matthew

lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Location Scout and Manager in the entertainment industry finding and supervising locations for commercial, television and film production.

lenders.name: Mel

lenders.occupational_info: I work with children and families who are experiencing significant challenges to their mental health and emotional wellbeing.

lenders.name: ian
lenders.occupation: a little of this a little of that

lenders.name: Ifeanyi
lenders.occupation: Worker for Shell Oil Company in Nigeria
lenders.loan_because: I am stranded over in Nigeria.  My children are located in Virginia and I am not able to get back to the states.  The company that I work for is not paying us right now and I have no means of getting back to the United States.  Whatever you can do to help me out will be greatly appreciated.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the Shell Oil Company but I am not getting paid at the moment.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's how I can still help, former Peace Corps and Habitat worker.
lenders.occupational_info: Oversee operation of bus systems throughout the southeast part of US

lenders.name: Åsa
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be a good way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Amrita & Raj
lenders.loan_because: We believe in making a difference by helping those who seek to better their lives.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I can’t think of a better foreign relations policy than this.  Kiva provides a pure and unfettered approach to helping honest people earn an honest living.  The ripple effect of these small businesses can be tremendous.  I love this concept and intend on expanding my portfolio over time.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: This is the most amazing idea.  One of my favorite quotes is "be the change you want to see in the world".  There are times when a person just needs a little help and if I can be a small part of someone realizing a goal, what could be better than that?  I love the individual aspect of this.  Many times when you give to large organizations you have no idea where the money actually goes and if it really goes to the person you want to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a voracious reader, an animal activist, and a woman who wants to make a difference in the world.
I was a founding member of a canine rescue organization in the United States and care very deeply for the disenfranchised people who share this planet.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: I live a pretty good life, the least I can do is help others make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce all radio and television programming for PossibilitiesMedia, as well as maintain the websites of C2 Church and Possibilities Church.

lenders.name: Greg

lenders.name: Cheryl

lenders.occupational_info: I help people upgrade their job skills through educational practices.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Susan & Peter
lenders.loan_because: I think most people want help rather than charity. It is great to assist and see the recipient building a business

lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a college and write about lives.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: In memory of my good friend, Ed Kopf, a retired school teacher from Florida. He taught biology and loved to help people. He passed away from cancer a number of years ago, but I keep giving, in his name, because this was a cause he cared deeply about.
lenders.occupational_info: I love Yeshua (Jesus) and I am so thankful for the opportunities that he has given me in this life. I am glad to be able to spread his love by loaning funds to individuals who are trying to make their lives better.

lenders.loan_because: I FEEL THE NEED TO HELP THOSE WHO  ARE LESS FORTUNATE THAN THOSE OF US BORN IN THE USA. I HAVE AN ADOPTED DAUGHTER FROM CHINA AND HAVE BEEN VERY BLESSED
lenders.occupational_info: RETIRED FROM LAW ENFORCEMENT AND CURRENTLY IN AUTO SALES

lenders.occupational_info: I manage my home for my husband and me. I cook, clean, garden, do repairs, pay bills; what ever is needed to care for ourselves and property.

lenders.occupational_info: I analyze current trends & events related to scarcity of natural resources, petroleum and water, to determine the most realistic way to a livable future for our children.

lenders.name: MGU Alumni
lenders.loan_because:
MGU Alumni Microfinance is a network of former MGU students wishing to support small entrepreneurs in the former Soviet republics. 

We all recieved a big bundle of help and encouragement while living in Moscow and struggling to learn Russian, and we wish to give some of that encourangement back those who are currently struggling to realise their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: MGU Alumni Microfinance is an independent network consisting of former students. It has no official ties to Moskovski Gosudarstvennyi Universitet, the Moscow State University.

lenders.name: PAOLO
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this kind of help

lenders.name: Kopfwerk Germany
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I know that you need money to start a business, to start to earn money. We have the potential to help, so it is our duty to simply do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Kopfwerk is a small creative agency with the wish to help to make this world a better place. Our team of 5 people likes to get involved and wants to change lives. If you like that idea and wish to contact us, please visit our website.

lenders.name: Sam and Marlys
lenders.loan_because: we can't afford to give as much as we want, but we DO want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Sam is the lead minister at a church in Cary, NC.  Marlys works for a bank, leading a team that takes care of people's retirement accounts.

lenders.name: Brian

lenders.occupational_info: I work with hospitals to underake projects and my wife assists persons in dealing with the challenges in their lives.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because:
I believe a loan that helps a person help himself or herself improves the world in a different and perhaps better way than just giving money.   

A person who receives a loan, improves his or her business,  and then  pays it back, can take extra pride in his or her accomplishments.   Thus, these loans uplift the human spirit as well as the standard of living.

lenders.name: Lewis & Donna
lenders.loan_because: it has been said "give a man a fish and you feed him for a day, but teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." We hope to help people change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
Lewis is an investigator with the Texas Department of Public Safety.
Donna is an RN at a local hospital.

lenders.loan_because: it is action.

lenders.occupational_info: As I am retired I mainly do community work where I now live and I am an active member of Rotary.

lenders.name: NYU Reynolds Program
lenders.occupational_info: The NYU Reynolds Program in Social Entrepreneurship is designed to attract, encourage and train a new generation of leaders in public service. We aim to provide the cross-disciplinary skills, experiences and networking opportunities needed to advance and support changemaker efforts to realize sustainable and scalable pattern-breaking solutions to society's most intractable problems.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small charity providing support to sex workers.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help economic development across the globe

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: People need direct help. Not relying on governments and losing the money in the process.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Through my travels I see how little it takes to make someone smile. If I can help, then I smile too.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my job. I get to discover something new every day, and I don't have to wear heels.

lenders.name: Pai NYC
lenders.loan_because: We should all do more small things with great love...I plan to add more loans to my portfolio throughout 2011-2012.
lenders.occupational_info:
Finance grad from the top undergraduate business school in the US. Researched socially-responsible investments (SRI) and sustainable banking in grad school back in 2003!  Wall Street financial and healthcare reform loooong overdue...!

Currently Reading:
Don't Ask What I Shot: How President Eisenhower’s Love of Golf Helped Shape 1950’s America 
http://www.amazon.com/Dont-Ask-What-Shot-Eisenhowers/dp/0071485708

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have to do what we can to raise standards of living in other areas of the world.  Furthermore, I want to cultivate and encourage the entrepreneurial spirit in individuals that live in areas where it is often difficult to succeed.  I firmly believe in "a hand up- not a hand out."
lenders.occupational_info:
I buy and sell vehicles (cars, trucks, rvs, etc) as well as work as a loan originator at an office that assists borrowers seeking short-term secured lending.  Our company also offers residential and commercial property management services from our office in Boise.
I live in Meridian with my wife, Misty- and have an adult son, named Alex.  We enjoy camping, boating, hiking, travel, snowshoeing, amateur radio (KC7CBF) and photography. (www.flickr.com/kc7cbf)

Be sure to SHOW ME "KIVA LOVE!!!"  If you heard of Kiva from me- please list my email as your referrer when you sign up- then I can keep up with you on Kiva!  Nick(a)e2800.com  -Thanks!
.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because:
"But we were born of risen apes, not fallen angels, and the apes were armed killers besides. And so what shall we wonder at? Our murders and massacres and missiles, and our irreconcilable regiments? Or our treaties whatever they may be worth; our symphonies however seldom they may be played; our peaceful acres, however frequently they may be converted into battlefields; our dreams however rarely they may be accomplished. The miracle of man is not how far he has sunk but how magnificently he has risen. We are known among the stars by our poems, not our corpses."
— Robert Ardrey

lenders.loan_because: I had my children choose a business so that they may see how their contribution could help another family somewhere in the world.  We hope to continue to add to our portfolio.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva makes it so easy!  
A few dollars gives people choices and the opportunity to improve life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Thorsten
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to support ideas - where not the big money but the small money counts.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping with Information Technology to make a change.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: So much can be accomplished with so little!

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people directly.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate.  Whenever I really needed help there was some one there to help me.  Living in the USA I have worked hard but always had access to an over abundance of  family, friends and the daily necessities of life.  Wouldn't it be nice if everyone could say the same thing.  Now it's my turn to help some one else.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use their computers to make their job easier for them to do.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: We're a global community and to reach out across the world and make even a small difference in someone's life  - that helps make the human community stronger. I feel blessed to be able to help someone else realize a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I use a computer to design and produce printed materials for my company to use to promote our products - catalogs, ads, literature. Also I make all the arrangements for my company to exhibit at and participate in trade shows.  We sell German-made laboratory products in the USA and Canada.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: no one should live in poverty if they are committed to bettering their lives through hard work and persistence.  Even people who are well off have achieved their success through a variety of loans whether they be car, home, business, or student loans.  It is only fair that everybody receives the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: I want to shine the light of Christ.  I may not be "rich", but God blesses me greatly, and I would like to share my blessings with others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a full-time graduate student; I am working on my Master of Arts in Counseling.

lenders.name: Yiling
lenders.loan_because: everybody need some help sometimes
lenders.occupational_info: We provide assistance to access services, such as housing, employment, education to people with mental illness.  Our goal is to reduce hospitalization, incarceration and homelessness among people with mental illness.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I have but a brief time to help the world and hopefully my contribution will make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked for over 20 years in accounting, prior to that I was a medical social worker.

lenders.name: laura
lenders.loan_because: i can and we should.
lenders.occupational_info: Landscape designer

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I'm so very lucky to have the life I do, and would like to pay a little of that back to someone who hasn't been as fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a federal law enforcement agency as a homicide analyst.  We help local law enforcement agencies that are trying to catch violent criminals.

lenders.name: Norbert
lenders.loan_because: I can afford it and other people need it.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: It is a good opportunity to be an active, positive force in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an instructional multimedia & web development specialist at Northwestern State University, specializing in web, print, and video development and design.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I wish these individuals success in their quests for a better life.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to help other people around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a legal assistant to two attorneys in a workers compensation practice, helping clients who have had on the job injuries.

lenders.name: cathy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women be as self-sufficient as possible and give them the chance to make a better life.

lenders.name: AnaP
lenders.occupational_info: I work in international development projects in Latin America

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I am 12 years old and with my grandmother we decided to loan because we like helping people who are in need
lenders.occupational_info: I just finished the 6th grade.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me with a wonderful, Peruvian wife and two children.  It is my turn to give back to the Peruvians.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants from around the world who come to the Washington, DC area to find a new life.

lenders.name: bob
lenders.loan_because: it works.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I have grandchildren.  I wish that all children can have the clean and healthy life that mine do.
lenders.occupational_info: My passion is teaching Environmental Science.  Especially about the need to live sustainably, leaving the world clean and with enough resources for our children and grandchildren.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I have lived and worked in 38 countries around the world.  I have seen some of the poorest people in person.  I see many hard working people who need access to financial resources to start or expand their business.  This is my way to make a meaningful contribution to these individuals who are so dedicated and work so hard in their businesses.   I want to pass along some of my good fortune to others.
lenders.occupational_info: As a management consultant, I help people to develop and expand their people skills at work.  I have enjoyed this work for over 25 years.

lenders.name: Philippina
lenders.loan_because: Helping parents to provide better for their children, so the next generation will be better educated and prepared to build a better life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I take care of and educate young children so the parents can work. I use a lot of music and Montessori.
I am a single mom of 3 kids (2 in grad school  on an RA/TA, 1 in highshool),

lenders.name: jimmy
lenders.loan_because: to help  less fortunate people, help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: install & maintain high-speed data eq

lenders.name: Jennifer & Bob
lenders.loan_because: We want to help entreprenuers around the world whos only funding source may be a microlender.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a bank, setting up small businesses with the ability to accept credit card payments from customers for goods and services.  My husband owns his own business, trimming and removing trees.

lenders.name: Wendy

lenders.occupational_info: I develop emissions control catalysts to help minimize pollution.

lenders.name: vincent
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to have been born in the USA, and so I feel it's my duty to help distribute the wealth and abundance to under-served places and people around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I build the internet.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility and privilage to share what I'm fortunate enough to have earned, with those who are not as fortunate.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I beleave in free enterprise and what better way to help.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: Micro credit is an awesome idea that lets people make a better life for themselves through their own hard work.   I think Kiva is the best idea yet for helping people.  Investing in people and watching them grow makes me feel like we can make a difference, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the guy you call when your computer doesn't work

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: There is a need, and I can help in a small way.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: the need is compelling and the "interest" is unbeatable.

I concentrate on providing loans to hard working women in Mexico, Central America, South America and Asia.

lenders.name: Madelyn
lenders.loan_because: I made my first loan when my mom was very ill.  It gave me a feeling of doing something positive when I felt so helpless in my own life.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with teenage students through the ministry of Young Life. Young Life is active in almost all the countries Kiva is working so check it out!

lenders.name: Julian

I was lucky to be born into a country where the opportunities are great.  I have nothing but admiration for those who are trying to better themselves.  I just wish I had more to loan...
lenders.occupational_info:
I find people jobs in charities throughout the UK.  This brings me huge pleasure - but not half as much as loaning through the Kiva website...

What an amazing idea - and one that I whole-heartedly endorse.  Keep it up!

lenders.loan_because: by lending, I give hope! Hope is one of the necessary ingredients in the life of a small business owner. Small businesses do so many wonderful things for the community and the world.

lenders.name: J. L.

lenders.name: Jeffrey

lenders.name: David Cox
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva is a charity which I can get on board with.  No middlemen taking cuts, PayPal has stepped in for the payment side with no expectations of profits and Kiva provides the opportunity to support the world economy in a straight forward and simple way that should be pushed and expanded upon in the future.

These loans are needed because they help people on a most basic level and will someday allow them to spend more of their capital on goods that enrich their lives.  

No gigantic CEO salary and all of your money goes to the loan applicant; this is what a charity should be.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with numbers a lot.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in individual lives, just as I am trying to make a difference in the life of my son (pictured).
